comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Because the images were uploaded in imgur. That's not anymore working because of some changes from imgur part.You can upload the images on talkimg.com and use here. Talkimg is dedicatedly built for bitcointalk community (not official image hosting from bitcointalk, thanks to joker_jossu).

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: You were using imgur, better to use other third hosting images e.g. imgbb, postingimages, or talkimg.Quote from: theymos on May 12, 2023, 12:41:48 AMI think that what it is is that imgur added a new very restrictive per-IP limit on image downloads. So all ip.bitcointalk.org requests are blocked, but even many Tor exit nodes are being blocked, for example.I'm not going to attempt to play some cat-and-mouse game with imgur, so people will just have to use a different service such as TalkImg.
